com.mapbox.services.android.navigation.v5.instruction

Class DefaultInstructionEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.util.SparseArray<com.mapbox.services.android.navigation.v5.instruction.DefaultInstructionEngine.InstructionBuilder>

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class DefaultInstructionEngine
extends android.util.SparseArray<com.mapbox.services.android.navigation.v5.instruction.DefaultInstructionEngine.InstructionBuilder>
    Creates voice instructions based on the default milestones provided by MapboxNavigation
    Since:
    0.4.0

      static java.lang.String createInstruction(RouteProgress routeProgress, int identifier)
      Provides the RouteProgress and milestone identifier to the DefaultInstructionEngine which returns the appropriate instruction.

    • Method Detail

      • createInstruction

        public static java.lang.String createInstruction(RouteProgress routeProgress,
                                                 int identifier)
        Provides the RouteProgress and milestone identifier to the DefaultInstructionEngine which returns the appropriate instruction. Will return an empty String if the milestone identifier provided is not one of the default identifiers
        Parameters:
        routeProgress - for current route data / distance
        identifier - for what type of instruction we want to build
        Returns:
        String instruction that has been created by the engine
        Since:
        0.4.0
